item.title: Only Because I Have To Be Here. - Devoid of Joy
item.dc:creator: Devoid-of-joy
item.description:
Thanks!
Ummm‚Ä¶ so my SoundCloud is a bit out there and all over the place. I make music more about sounds rather melody. Lots of noise, distortion, and automations.
This track uses 3 instruments (Kbass, Grain, and, angry) and a custom drum kit with a riser, 2 percussions, and a kick.
